Name: Sillimanite 4ct
Description:
Product Details
GEM TYPE: Sillimanite
TOTAL WEIGHT: 4ct
SIZE : (LxWxH): 11x8.3x3.2mm
SHAPE: Oval
COLOR: Green
HARDNESS: 5.5-7.5
ORIGIN: Africa
TREATMENT: Unheated / Untreated
ShortDescription:
Sillimanite
It is named after its discoverer Benjamin Silliman.
It is related to andalusite and kyanite. These three polymorphous minerals - share the same chemical composition but different crystal structures.
Al2(SiO4)O
meta-description: Green oval Sillimanite 4ct (11x8.3x3.2mm) from Africa - Not treated

Name: Iolite 2.10ct
Description:
Product Details
GEM TYPE: Iolite
TOTAL WEIGHT: 2.10ct
SIZE : (LxWxH): 9.3x7.5x4.8mm
SHAPE: Oval
COLOR: Green
HARDNESS: 7-7.5
ORIGIN: Africa
TREATMENT: Unheated / Untreated
ShortDescription:
Iolite (Cordierite)
It was discovered in 1813 by Louis Cordier who named it after him. The term Iolite derives from the Greek 'ios' - violet.
It has a very marked trichroism (3 different colors, depending on the angle you look at it)
meta-description: Green oval Iolite 2.10ct (9.3x7.5x4.8mm) from Africa - Not treated
